page.title: 19SCENIC FAIRLIGHT EAST SUSSEX
page.content:
The villages of Fairlight, Guestling and Pett, as well as Hastings Country Park are popular with tourists.
The steep slopes and deep valleys of Hastings Country Park and the undulating nature of the surrounding area provide scenic views from many high points. The sandstone cliffs of the coastline attract many visitors. There are many public footpaths criss-crossing the Country Park and throughout the area allowing tourists and residents the opportunity to explore the area. An open-topped double decker bus operates along Fairlight Road during summer months.
In Pett there is a Methodist Church dated 1948 and St Mary & St Peter's Parish Church. Guestling has a chapel and Fairlight has two churches.
